apihelp-homepagequestionstore-summary: Obtain formatted questions posted via homepage modules
apihelp-homepagequestionstore-param-ques: The format to return the questions in, e.g. HTML.
apihelp-homepagequestionstore-param-stor: The storage location of the questions.
apihelp-homepagequestionstore-param-user: The user ID to obtain questions for.
apihelp-growthsetmentor-summary: Set user's mentor. Change will be publicly logged.
apihelp-growthinvalidateimagerecommendat: Title of the article the image recommendation task is for
apihelp-query+growthimagesuggestiondata-: Fetch associated [[mw:wikitech:Add_Image|image suggestion data]], if available
